articles.title: Trump backs idea to send some DOGE savings to American citizens - The Associated Press
articles.description: President Donald Trump says he likes the idea to give some of the savings from Elon Musk’s Department of Government Efficiency back to U.S. citizens as a kind of dividend. Trump expressed support twice Wednesday, first at an investment conference in Miami and…
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) President Donald Trump said that he likes the idea of giving some of the savings from Elon Musks Department of Government Efficiency back to U.S. citizens as a kind of dividend.

articles.title: ‘Zero Day’ TV Review: Robert De Niro’s Netflix Political Thriller Fights To Make America Function Again - Deadline
articles.description: Ripped out of the underbelly of modern America as much as the headline, the Robert De Niro starring Zero Day will show it can happen here.
